settings.accordion_name: Are there other treatments that work for hair loss?
settings.accordion_name_p:
While there are many hair loss treatments on the market–from laser helmets to gummy bears–finasteride and minoxidil are the only products approved by the FDA to treat hair loss.

Another option to treat hair loss is a hair transplant procedure, which we offer at our Keeps Hair Restoration Studio. To learn more about if YatesMD Hair Restoration is a good fit for you, schedule a free phone consult with a patient advisor.

If other hair loss treatments come to the market that are FDA-approved and clinically-proven to work, we’ll definitely consider them. Meanwhile, you can get started with YatesMD today.

settings.heading_text_inner: Please text or call us at (833) 745-3377, chat us, or email us at help@YatesMD.com.
settings.heading_Inner: Para soporte en español, envíenos un mensaje de texto a (833) 745-3377 o envíenos un correo electrónico a help@YatesMD.com.
